value.description: The inferno pistol is pistol-sized melta weapon of highly specialised and ancient technology created by artificers. Melta weapons are lethal anti-armour guns, most effective at very short range. When fired, the super-heating of the air produces a distinctive and sinister hiss. Solid rock is reduced to molten slag, and living creatures are vaporised in an instant.\n\nThe Seraphim pattern inferno pistol is widely used by the Sisters of the Adepta Sororitas.

ThingDef.label: meltagun (Jove pattern)
ThingDef.description: Meltaguns are the basic version of melta weapons, used by a wide range of forces of Imperial origin. Melta weapons are lethal anti-armour guns, most effective at very short range. When fired, the super-heating of the air produces a distinctive and sinister hiss. Solid rock is reduced to molten slag, and living creatures are vaporised in an instant.\n\nThe Jove pattern meltagun is widely used by the Sisters of the Adepta Sororitas.

ThingDef.label: multi-melta (Jove pattern)
ThingDef.description: Multi-meltas are a larger version of the meltagun, which have both and increased maximum range and are more effective as an anti-armour weapon compared to the standard meltagun, at the cost of portability and ease-of-use. Melta weapons are lethal anti-armour guns, most effective at very short range. When fired, the super-heating of the air produces a distinctive and sinister hiss. Solid rock is reduced to molten slag, and living creatures are vaporised in an instant.\n\nThe Jove pattern multi-melta is used by heavy weapons specialists of the Adepta Sororitas.
